availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Worked as a laborer on his father’s farm in Barren County, Kentucky according the 1850 Federal Census. Married Nancy Dilley in an undetermined year. There is no record of him marrying another woman.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, “George W. Polson (December 22, 1830-April 30, 1903),” Memorial #37110548, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=37110548 (accessed June 5, 2017); Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren, Division 2, p. 831.
